title: On The Pitch, At Centre Court: The Week In Sports
teaser: Soccer and tennis are a world apart when it comes to sportsmanship, as we've seen in the ongoing World Cup and Wimbledon tournaments. Slate's Mike Pesca talks with NPR's Don Gonyea about the contrast.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
